responseText: Cargo must first be packed into a crate, or some resources may be purchased pre-packed. Crates are usually crafted by carpenters, but If you're interested in driving a caravan of your own, or just want to learn how to pack cargo, I'll give you a Small Crate to pack so that you can practice. Pack it up with some resources, and let me know once you've done that.
name: Node_Caravansary_Helper_9_Response
